title: Imported logins are not syncing
content:
I imported logins into my Firefox account from MS Edge. I enabled Sync. When I signed in on a new device with my Firefox account, there are only two logins showing up. It looks like the logins that were imported are not syncing.

I have already forced a sync using "Sync Now" in the profile menu on both devices. It has been about 10 minutes with no additional logins being synced yet.

Any help is appreciated. Thank you!
creator: bbaas

title: MP4 videos encoded with H264 say "Video can't be played because the file is corrupt"
content:
I routinely record short screencasts with Kazam, and I can't watch my own videos after posting them on sites like GitHub because Firefox says "Video can't be played because the file is corrupt". Or for example when I upload them to sites like ezgif to convert them to a GIF, which works just fine because, well, the file is not corrupt. Other browsers like Chromium play them just fine.

Apparently the "OpenH264 Video Codec provided by Cisco Systems, Inc" is properly enabled in my system. This has been happening to me for months or years, but only today I decided to open a thread here.

There are two things here:

1. Firefox can't play the file. I'm sure there's some sort of misconfiguration on my side, or bad defaults, or a missing plugin, or similar. 2. Firefox shows a misleading message. The file is not corrupt! The root cause is something else.

Any advice on how to fix the first one?
creator: hello152

title: F-Secure extension not allowed by Firefox
content: I've used Firefox as my preferred browser for several years. However, now it no longer allows the F-Secure banking protection extension. I've contacted F-Secure, but despite their efforts I've been unable to add this extension. Firefox won't allow it. If you can help that would be great. In the meantime, I shall use another browser which allows this essential extension.

creator: ineuw

title: YouTube & Facebook non caricano immagini e Google non cerca
content:
Dopo qualche minuto di collegamento Youtube smette di mostrare le anteprime (vedi allegato) altre volte invece cliccando un video, firefox dice di essere off-line (cosa non vera). quando si verificano questi errori generalmente anche facebook smette di mostrare le immagini e i video, al loro posto appare un riquadro che descrive il contenuto tipo: "potrebbe essere un bambino in un parco" mentre per i video "abbiamo riscontrato problemi, questo contenuto non è al momento disponibile riprova più tardi" Anche google presenta problemi, a volte la ricerca smette di funzionare, sia che si scriva nella home page sia che si scriva nella barra indirizzi non appaiono i risultati, oppure cliccando sui risultati di ricerca apre una nuova scheda con nulla dentro. Firefox è aggiornato,ho provato anche a creare un profilo nuovo e lo sto usando con estensioni disabilitate ma il problema si ripropone. Aprire nuove schede o nuove finestre non risolve, occorre chiudere il browser e riaprire, in quel caso funziona correttamente per qualche tempo, poi di nuovo l'errore si ripresenta. Gli altri browser funzionano correttamente.

grazie per l'aiuto
creator: paolo.zaccaria

title: HTML5 form element language is inconsistent
content:
Hello, I'm developing a registration system in the Czech language. I was surprised how the form elements are displayed in different browsers and apparently I can't do anything about it even as a developer. I have set Czech language in browsers and in Wordpress, but form elements are displayed differently in different browsers.

Firefox has a good understanding of how the data format should look, but the yes/no selection fields are displayed in English, which doesn't happen in Brave.

Wait, now I see that all browsers except Brave are displaying Yes/No in English. How is possible to control this?

The link to the above page is temporarily here: http://www.awaldorf.cz/events/letni-kurz-waldorfske-pedagogiky-2022-beta/
creator: info7547

title: Firefox in Linux no longer has the option to show title bar?
content:
Upgrading my Linux install to a current version, and in so doing, discovered newer versions of both Firefox and Thunderbird totally disregard title bars and other window decorations. As I run Fluxbox, those are kinda necessary, and the browser and email client both lack essential elements like a close button without them. Many, MANY suggestions to check the "Customize..." but, that doesn't seem to exist in 101? What exists instead is "Customize Toolbar...", which does not have the little checkbox in the lower left corner to re-enable the title bar.

Any suggestions?

title: Firefox lakkasi toimimasta
content:
Firefox lakkasi toimimasta viime viikolla, ei saa yhteyttä nettiin. asetusvalikot ym ei avaudu. Avautuu vain tyhjä selain. Ei anna mitään virheilmoitusta. Läppärissä on F-Securen Internet Security, siellä ei näytä olevan estoja firefoxille Window Defenderin palomuuri ohjelmastakaan en löydä mitään estoja Firefoxille.

Muut selaimet toimii, Crome ja Edge

Olen ladannut firefoxin uudelleen parikin kertaa. Käytössä on win 10 x64 Firefox versio näyttäs olevan 101

Kyllähän muillakin selaimilla voi surffailla, mutta kun Firefox olis paras

title: Can't sync firefox custom preferences
content:
I know there's [[an article|https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/sync-custom-preferences#w_sync-custom-preferences]] on how to sync custom preferences. I wanted to sync my toolbar customizations and some other preferences like disabling disk caching. And I don't even have other firefox instances, instead I just want to sync only on one device, so that I can continue the same setup when I signin later on the same device.

I've tried to add services.sync.prefs.sync.browser.uiCustomization.state, "services.sync.prefs.sync.browser.cache.disk.enable" and set it to true. But it doesn't work. What am I missing? No one seems to address this. May I am missing something.
creator: pcoop

title: Firefox exits immediately after opening, no other parts of the program work
content:
Whenever I try to open firefox, a blank screen opens, then immediately closes. I have tried reinstalling firefox, as well as deleting my user profile and restarting my computer. if I try to open the program in safe mode, the same thing happens. If I try to run the profile manager, it will immediately close as well. I do not have an antivirus installed potentially blocking it, and I have let it through the windows firewall. I never get a crash report window or an error message.

I am running windows 10 and installed both firefox and the installer freshly today. I have not previously gotten it to work on this PC

title: Reinstalling Firefox and linking to an existing account
content:
My desktop computer had a meltdown requiring a new hard drive and re-installation of Firefox. Upon installation I was asked for an authentication code but I have never put the two step process in place.

I'm then asked for a 10 digit number provided when setting up my account. I set my account up multiple years ago and have an alpha numeric code which does not work.

I can still access my account on my laptop - just cant reinstall on my desktop.

OS - Windows 10 - up to date, downloaded yesterday. Same with Firefox.

Suggestions?
